name: Continuum (itch) (Afterlife_1707)
description:
Continuum is a top down shooter with puzzle elements. There are very simple mechanics with basic movement and shooting. There is a text based story being told in the game with funny narration. Its meant to be a difficult game with very punishable death, so don't give up and keep trying.  Its definitely for those who like challenges and also who are just looking for a fun little game.

I made it for the 48 hr BYOG Game Jam 2022, on my birthday.  So basically this is what I did on my 22nd birthday. Hope you enjoy!

Controls : WASD Movement and Left Click to Shoot

Playtime : 10-20mins
